mapper.insert:
insert into record (
tid, kehu_id, fws_id, address, project, fwsj, fwhouse, kehuyj, kehuqz, qr ) values (
default, #{kehuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fwsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{project,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fwsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fwhouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kehuyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{kehuqz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into record (
tid, kehu_id, fws_id, address, project, fwsj, fwhouse, kehuyj, kehuqz, qr ) values
(
default, #{item.kehuId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fwsId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.project,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fwsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fwhouse,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.kehuyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.kehuqz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.qr,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.select:
select * from record where 1=1
and tid like '%${ tid }%'
and kehu_id like '%${ kehuId }%'
and fws_id like '%${ fwsId }%'
and address like '%${ address }%'
and project like '%${ project }%'
and fwsj like '%${ fwsj }%'
and fwhouse like '%${ fwhouse }%'
and kehuyj like '%${ kehuyj }%'
and kehuqz like '%${ kehuqz }%'
and qr like '%${ qr }%'
